channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13045] Ensure MapReduce javadoc example works
item.description: Backport the docs / test parts of HBASE-13027 that are applicable to 0.98.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12698862/HBASE-13045-0.98.1.patch.txt
against 0.98 branch at commit c96df5e240baed7509d77f6349effe0777ebef57.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12698862

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 11 new or modified tests.
+1 hadoop versions. The patch compiles with all supported hadoop versions (2.4.1 2.5.2 2.6.0)

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 checkstyle. The applied patch does not increase the total number of checkstyle errors

-1 findbugs. The patch appears to introduce 5 new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/12847//testReport/

This message is automatically generated.
AFAICT, those findbugs warnings are just the current count on the 0.98 line not lining up with the expected count from master.

SUCCESS: Integrated in HBase-0.98 #866 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-0.98/866/)
HBASE-13045 Tests to validate our example use of TableInputFormatBase (busbey: rev 2f428bf74205cd1088694108777755a5b39242aa)

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-0.98-on-Hadoop-1.1 #824 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-0.98-on-Hadoop-1.1/824/)
HBASE-13045 Tests to validate our example use of TableInputFormatBase (busbey: rev 2f428bf74205cd1088694108777755a5b39242aa)

  • hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/TableInputFormatBase.java
  • hbase-server/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/MapreduceTestingShim.java
  • hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapred/TableInputFormatBase.java
  • hbase-server/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapreduce/TestTableInputFormat.java
  • hbase-server/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/mapred/TestTableInputFormat.java

Addendum for 0.98 branch.

In Hadoop 1.1 mapred.TableMap's type requirements for the output key only works with Text. Since we're not actually outputting anything in the test mapper, just updated the type.

Ran TestTableInputFormat under both default and hadoop.profile=1.1.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12700081/HBASE-13045-0.98.addendum.1.patch.txt
against 0.98 branch at commit 7792dee0c36de9b3108ebf60f6394f2d7e9a1b9f.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12700081

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 4 new or modified tests.
+1 hadoop versions. The patch compiles with all supported hadoop versions (2.4.1 2.5.2 2.6.0)

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

Is this still broke against hadoop1? https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#label/hbase/14bb8f54854fcab2 Thanks
Sorry, I was waiting for a +1 on the addendum. I'll go ahead and push.

This issue was closed as part of a bulk closing operation on 2015-11-20. All issues that have been resolved and where all fixVersions have been released have been closed (following discussions on the mailing list).
